channel.title: Need help port forwarding! PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Hey there im using a [i][b]Belkin Wireless G Router F5D7230-4 [u]Version No: 7002uk[/u][/b][/i]
If anyone can help me i really need HELP! when my modem is not connected to the router my server works and lets other users connect but when the router is connected im the only one that can connect to the server please help me can anyone help me portforward my router?
[u][i][b]All Help Is Apreciated! Regards... Robert :cool:[/b][/i][/u]

item.title: Need help port forwarding! PLEASE HELP!

Portforwarding is your own job to get done.
